params._investmentAddress: Address of the investment token to join
params._investmentTokensOut: Min amount of investment tokens to receive
params._maxAmountIn: Max amount of the token to deposit

params._investmentAddress: Address of the investment token to exit
params._investmentTokenIn: Quantity of investment tokens to return
params._minAmountOut: Min token quantities to receive from the investment

returns._0: uint256                           Amount of investment shares to receive
address                           Returns the asset that this investment needs

params._asset: Address of the convex lp token

returns._0: uint256                       Pid of the pool in convex
uint256                           Returns the price in ETH of an investment share
address                            Returns the asset that this investment obtains
address                            Returns the address with the token of extra rewards
returns._1: uint256                            Extra rewards received so far

getExpectedShares(address,uint256).notice: Gets the amount of shares expected to get after depositing _ethAmount

getInvestmentAsset(address).notice: Gets the asset needed to enter the investment

getName().notice: Returns the name of the integration

getPid(address).notice: Gets the PID in convex of a convex lp token

getPricePerShare(address).notice: Gets how much eth one unit of the investment is worth

getResultAsset(address).notice: Gets the asset you obtained after entering the investment

getRewards(address,address).notice: Gets the rewards and the token that they are denominated in
